add_subdirectory(KDTree)
#add_subdirectory(ndarray)
add_subdirectory(cpp-btree)
add_subdirectory(libstable)
add_subdirectory(msgpack-c)
add_subdirectory(cpptrace)

#include_directories(BEFORE ndarray/include)
include_directories(PUBLIC BEFORE cpp-btree/btree)
include_directories(PUBLIC BEFORE libstable/stable/src)
include_directories(PUBLIC BEFORE msgpack-c/include)
include_directories(PUBLIC BEFORE cpptrace/include)
